description: Building operations in respect of the erection of the remaining dwellings under planning permission LB21/P3927/71/7213'O'.
site_name: 27 Burdon Lane And1-6 Burdon ParkCheamSuttonSM2 7PP
decision_conditions: Under Section 192 (1)(b) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) it is considered that building operations in respect of the erection of the remaining dwellings under planning permission LB21/P3927/71/7213'O' are extant.
